content.question: At the time the petition was produced, Congress most likely interpreted the petition's purpose as

choices.label: requesting federal funding for transportation construction projects
rallying support to end commercial relations with Great Britain
encouraging White settlers to use canals to migrate to new states
promoting the development of agriculture at the expense of industry

content.answer: requesting federal funding for transportation construction projects

skill.text: Skill 2.B: Explain the point of view, purpose, historical situation, and/or audience of a source.
